ideals,"},{"lineNumber":13376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は嘘でも、いつか本当になるかもしれない。","translatedEnglishLine":" even if they're lies now, someday they might become on.\""},{"lineNumber":13378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間の幸福は、己の命をなげうっても良いと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Human happiness lies in believing that it is worth risking one's own life,"},{"lineNumber":13379,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう思える事に身命を賭す事だよ」","translatedEnglishLine":" and dedicating your life to such a belief.\""},{"lineNumber":13380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それで、今も革命の続きって事？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, you're saying the revolution is still ongoing now?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうも、説得のための言葉を誇張させたりすると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow, when you exaggerate words for persuasion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私自身も最初からそうだったかのように……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I end up convincing myself as if it was true from the start..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……自分自身をも説得してしまう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You mean you end up persuading even yourself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言うんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is that what you're saying?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ……気づいたのは最近なのだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... I've only noticed it recently though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうやら自分の技能に少し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems I am somewhat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振り回されているようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: being swayed by my own skills."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面目次第もない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's utterly embarrassing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうしますか？　総統……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What shall we do? Supreme Leader..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とりあえず、おかしくなった奴を戻せ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First of all, bring back those who've gone mad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから…………ん、そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... hmm, yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「回りくどいことをするからいかんのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's bad to do things so roundabout.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストレートに俺様を崇める集団を作れ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make a group that straightforwardly worships me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「目的が一直線なら歪みもしないだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If the goal is straightforward, there won't be any distortion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、美人はこっちによこせよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, send the beauties over here too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （総統を崇めるというだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Just by worshiping the Supreme Leader,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歪んでいる気がしないでもないですが……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't help but feel it's a bit twisted...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ……そうだな、そうしてみよう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... yes, let's try that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穏健で、士気を支えられるような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something moderate, that can support morale..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう。どうせやるなら俺の役に立て。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. If we're doing it, make it useful to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、楽しみだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, I look forward to it."
Some days later...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「事ここに至っては！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that things have come to this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現政権を打倒し！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Overthrow the current regime!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統ランス閣下を暗殺するしか――――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no choice but to assassinate Supreme Leader Rance――――"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、なんでじゃーーーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Why is thatーーーーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう、か……ダニエルの息子……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see... Daniel's son...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの者、魔物であったか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That person was a demon after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま……ね。そーゆーこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... yeah. That's how it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーバー親子は互いにグラスに視線を落とし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Server father and son lowered their gazes to their glasses,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ややぎこちなく、杯を交わしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and exchanged drinks somewhat awkwardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四天王となり……しかし、唐突に変貌し……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Becoming one of the Four Heavenly Kings... but then suddenly changing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを憎んだのも、そのせいだったかもな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe hating Zeth was because of that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国に、娘を奪われたようで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if the country stole his daughter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……言っておくけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Just so you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まともだったとしても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if he had been sane,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん……あんたの要求は蹴ってたわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he probably would have rejected your request."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「縁故で長官にしてくれなんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To ask to be made chief by favoritism...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧ゼスの悪習そのまんまじゃないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's exactly the bad custom of old Zeth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな……それは私も、普通ではなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right... I, too, was not normal in that regard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……しょぼくれちゃって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You've really let yourself go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずいぶん油が抜けたみたいじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like all your energy has drained away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「であれば、わざわざこんな所まで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that’s the case, you wouldn't have come all the way here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き恥を晒しには来ないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exposing yourself to public shame."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……そ。まぁ、いいけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... I see. Well, it's fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスは、血を流したが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Zeth shed blood, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それによって、良き方向に向かう可能性はある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a possibility it will move in a better direction because of that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何が良く、何が悪いか……それは後の世が語る事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is good and what is bad... that is for future generations to judge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行動を、しなければならん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must take action.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを滅ぼさぬため……後の世を、残すため」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To prevent the destruction of Zeth... and to leave a future behind."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は今も昔も、変わっていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have not changed, now or in the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔ほど……性急ではなくなったがね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though I am less hasty than before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「口は達者なんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're quite eloquent, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「理想を叫び続ければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you keep shouting your ideals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は嘘でも、いつか本当になるかもしれない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if they're lies now, someday they might become truth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が倒れても、誰かが継いでくれるかもしれない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if I fall, someone might carry it on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の幸福は、己の命をなげうっても良いと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Human happiness lies in believing that it is worth risking one's own life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう思える事に身命を賭す事だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and dedicating your life to such a belief."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで、今も革命の続きって事？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, you're saying the revolution is still ongoing now?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうも、説得のための言葉を誇張させたりすると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow, when you exaggerate words for persuasion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私自身も最初からそうだったかのように……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I end up convincing myself as if it was true from the start..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……自分自身をも説得してしまう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You mean you end up persuading even yourself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言うんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is that what you're saying?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ……気づいたのは最近なのだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... I've only noticed it recently though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうやら自分の技能に少し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems I am somewhat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振り回されているようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: being swayed by my own skills."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面目次第もない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's utterly embarrassing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうしますか？　総統……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What shall we do? Supreme Leader..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とりあえず、おかしくなった奴を戻せ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First of all, bring back those who've gone mad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それから…………ん、そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... hmm, yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「回りくどいことをするからいかんのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's bad to do things so roundabout.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストレートに俺様を崇める集団を作れ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make a group that straightforwardly worships me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「目的が一直線なら歪みもしないだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If the goal is straightforward, there won't be any distortion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、美人はこっちによこせよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, send the beauties over here too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （総統を崇めるというだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Just by worshiping the Supreme Leader,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歪んでいる気がしないでもないですが……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't help but feel it's a bit twisted...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ……そうだな、そうしてみよう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... yes, let's try that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穏健で、士気を支えられるような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something moderate, that can support morale..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう。どうせやるなら俺の役に立て。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. If we're doing it, make it useful to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、楽しみだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, I look forward to it."
Some days later...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「事ここに至っては！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that things have come to this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現政権を打倒し！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Overthrow the current regime!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統ランス閣下を暗殺するしか――――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no choice but to assassinate Supreme Leader Rance――――"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、なんでじゃーーーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Why is thatーーーーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう、か……ダニエルの息子……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see... Daniel's son...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの者、魔物であったか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That person was a demon after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま……ね。そーゆーこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... yeah. That's how it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サーバー親子は互いにグラスに視線を落とし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Server father and son lowered their gazes to their glasses,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ややぎこちなく、杯を交わしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and exchanged drinks somewhat awkwardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四天王となり……しかし、唐突に変貌し……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Becoming one of the Four Heavenly Kings... but then suddenly changing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを憎んだのも、そのせいだったかもな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe hating Zeth was because of that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国に、娘を奪われたようで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if the country stole his daughter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……言っておくけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Just so you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まともだったとしても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if he had been sane,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん……あんたの要求は蹴ってたわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he probably would have rejected your request."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「縁故で長官にしてくれなんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To ask to be made chief by favoritism...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧ゼスの悪習そのまんまじゃないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's exactly the bad custom of old Zeth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな……それは私も、普通ではなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right... I, too, was not normal in that regard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……しょぼくれちゃって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You've really let yourself go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずいぶん油が抜けたみたいじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like all your energy has drained away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「であれば、わざわざこんな所まで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that’s the case, you wouldn't have come all the way here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き恥を晒しには来ないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exposing yourself to public shame."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……そ。まぁ、いいけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... I see. Well, it's fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ゼスは、血を流したが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Zeth shed blood, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それによって、良き方向に向かう可能性はある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a possibility it will move in a better direction because of that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何が良く、何が悪いか……それは後の世が語る事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is good and what is bad... that is for future generations to judge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行動を、しなければならん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must take action.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスを滅ぼさぬため……後の世を、残すため」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To prevent the destruction of Zeth... and to leave a future behind."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は今も昔も、変わっていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have not changed, now or in the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔ほど……性急ではなくなったがね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though I am less hasty than before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「口は達者なんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're quite eloquent, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「理想を叫び続ければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you keep shouting your ideals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は嘘でも、いつか本当になるかもしれない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even if they're lies now, someday they might become truth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が倒れても、誰かが継いでくれるかもしれない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if I fall, someone might carry it on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間の幸福は、己の命をなげうっても良いと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Human happiness lies in believing that it is worth risking one's own life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう思える事に身命を賭す事だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and dedicating your life to such a belief."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それで、今も革命の続きって事？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, you're saying the revolution is still ongoing now?"
